reviews.review:
As much as I am enjoying this game, installing it seems to have messed up my Windows 7 window appearances. I.e. translucent things are no longer translucent and a lot of the quality of life things (desktop preview in the bottom right, windows preview by hovering over taskbar icons, etc) do not work anymore. I cannot in good faith recommend that Valve has neglected to update so that it doesn't mess up something the game shouldn't even touch.

Any advice to fix this without uninstalling the game (until I've finished it lmao) would be appreciated

A legendary game, a revolutionary game, a turning point for FPS games. A fun experience from start to finish. I mean it's Half-Life, what more do I need to say? The game that introduced us to one of the most iconic video game character, a crowba- jk, it's Gordon Freeman, but the crowbar is also somewhat true. If you haven't played this game yet, I'm just gonna say "My God what are you doing?"
Anlatılacak herhangi bişey yok half life işte :D

A good action, puzzle, and story filled game!

Wow, did this game hold up well in the long run. There's a reason this game is still looked upon fondly. The setting is interesting, the gameplay is fast paced and fun, and the story has that classic Valve tinge to it that makes it extra gripping, while not telling you very much directly. Although, like every game, there are flaws. I experienced many glitches, most of which had to do with getting stuck on random bits of geometry. But, as is well known, the absolute lowest point in this game has to be the final chapter, Xen. Ugly, slow, boring and filled with clunky platforming, and a mediocre final boss to top it all off. But, overall this game has held up tremendously well, even to someone who has only recently played it for the first time. A solid 8/10, maybe even 9.

I know this game is considered a classic, but I had nothing but terrible experiences with it. Between constant stuttering and getting stuck in areas because of bugged lift physics, I could not bring myself to continue playing.

Amazing game with a few big flaws, the biggest of which are the on a rail and zen chapters. for the most part, they are boring and confusing to navigate. The rest of the game is fun because of the huge amount of control you have over how to approach situations. I love that you can kill almost all of the npcs, but are rewarded for not doing it.

Outside of the base game there is still an active modding community, which is amazing for such an old game.

A classic. I got stuck at some parts, like where you have to shimmy behind a pipe or crawl through a small crack. Those were annoying, because I had no idea where to go. Other then that, the game is great. I especially like the boss fight at the end.

Oh yeah it will also say its running, even though it isn't. The "Stop" button on steam doesn't work either. A little buggy, but considering it's age its not too bad.

Half Life is a very old game, considered a classic first person shooter, where you not only kill enemies, but solve puzzles as well. I finished the game in Normal mode and the game was fun except for a few things, sometimes it may not be obvious where to go, every once in a while I would have to look up a guide to find out where to go next. "On A Rail" very long, very annoying, I did not use a guide for this but I won't judge if you do. [spoiler] "Nihilanth" [/spoiler] I just cheesed it, you probably should too. Despite some of the flaws, it's still a solid game, 8.5/10, minus 1 point for On A Rail and minus 0.5 points for the final boss. Good game would play again.
gourd. freem. enjoy game.
por la suculenta nostalgia
great game and it has aged well
BUENARDOOOO

Though the graphics aren't what they used to be Half-Life tells an engaging and creative story using shooter and puzzle solving elements. Whether you're a series veteran or a new comer (like myself) this is game will give you a good time!
e
Great game great graphics

This game is amazing! Everything in it was so good and it still holds up after all of these years. the graphics are good considering the time this came out and the combat is really flawless. Very little glitches, sometimes when loading you will get stuck in place and the only way I found to fix it was by loading your last save which can be annoying depending when the game last saved or when you last saved but not to big of an issue I just encountered it the most while playing surface tension. I don't know what else to say about this game it was perfect. I did get it on sale for $2 but even at the original price it is worth it.
top  of the line shooter solid story, fun and creative environments, kinda dated on the models but the game play makes up for it, definite a must buy 10/10.
Haven't played this game for 17 years and still enjoyed every second. Hard difficulty is well balanced and every scenario you are placed in still has impact to this day.
It hasn't aged perfectly so sometimes it's difficult to find the motivation to play this game but when i do it's always fun.
El mejor juego de la historia

Great game. I thought it would be outdated but only played it because I need the story for Half-Life 2 and I was wrong.When ever I get stuck its not in a stupid way, but because I'm stupid and didn't see a area that I had to go through. I haven't gotten angry with a stupid feature in the game so that's nice. The shoot outs with the military people were always fun having to stratadigize some times. Only problem is that every few minutes ( normally around 20 )  you get frozen but you can just load a save from 1 to 2 rooms ago so that's nice.

Great game! definitely a must have if you are getting into shooters. The only complaint I have is that the server hosting is a little time consuming but thankfully there are usually many open/ empty servers that you can play on.
